# Complete Log Analytics Workspace Fixture

This fixture demonstrates a comprehensive Log Analytics Workspace configuration with quotas and diagnostic settings.

## Features

- Workspace with extended retention and daily quota
- Diagnostic settings streaming metrics to a storage account
- Explicit public ingestion/query settings

## Usage

```bash
terraform init
terraform plan
terraform apply
```

## Cleanup

```bash
terraform destroy
```
